gui.controller

Class HandleOccasionalVisitorScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.HandleOccasionalVisitorScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class HandleOccasionalVisitorScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for handling occasional visitor requests and processing new occasional visits.
